movie.title: Big Miracle
movie.plot: An animal-loving volunteer and a small-town news reporter are joined by a native Alaskan boy to rally an entire community - and eventually rival world superpowers - to save a family of majestic gray whales trapped by rapidly forming ice in the Arctic Circle.

events.title: a family of gray whales is found trapped in the ice in Alaska
Bamm-Bamm, the youngest of the whales, dies
the Russian ship Admiral Makarov finally breaks through the ice
